short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage all your extensions in one place.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Extension Manager provides a streamlined solution for managing all your extensions in one convenient location.

ðŸ”‘ Key Features:
- One-Click Control: Enable or disable all extensions with a single click.
- Custom Groups: Organize extensions into groups tailored to your preferences.
- Search Functionality: Quickly find specific extensions or groups.
- Favorites: Mark extensions as favorites for easy access.
- Dark Mode: Enjoy a visually comfortable dark mode option.
